Class NotificationController

java.lang.Object
control.notification.NotificationController
public class NotificationController extends Object
Controller for managing notifications related to users. It provides functionality to create, retrieve, mark as read, and notify users or admins about various events.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    NotificationController()
    Private constructor to prevent instantiation.

  • Constructor Details

    • NotificationController

      public NotificationController()
      Private constructor to prevent instantiation. Initializes the observers map.

  • Method Details

    • getInstance

      public static NotificationController getInstance()
      Retrieves the singleton instance of the NotificationController.
      Returns:
      The singleton instance of NotificationController.

    • createNotification

      public static Notification createNotification(String userId, String message)
      Creates a new notification for a specific user with a message.
      Parameters:
      userId - The ID of the user to receive the notification.
      message - The content of the notification.
      Returns:
      The created Notification object.

    • getNotificationByUser

      public static List<Notification> getNotificationByUser(User user)
      Retrieves the list of notifications for a given user, sorted by the notification's datetime. Admin users (whose IDs start with "A") receive both general and admin-specific notifications.
      Parameters:
      user - The user whose notifications are to be retrieved.
      Returns:
      A sorted list of notifications for the user.

    • markNotificationsRead

      public void markNotificationsRead(String userId)
      Marks all notifications for a specific user as read.
      Parameters:
      userId - The ID of the user whose notifications are to be marked as read.

    • notifyAdmins

      public void notifyAdmins(String message)
      Notifies all admin users about a specific message.
      Parameters:
      message - The message to notify the admins.

    • registerObserver

      public void registerObserver(String id, IObserver observer)
      Registers an observer to receive notifications for a specific user ID.
      Parameters:
      id - The ID of the user to register the observer for.
      observer - The observer to register.

    • removeObserver

      public void removeObserver(String id)
      Removes an observer from the list of observers for a specific user ID.
      Parameters:
      id - The ID of the user to remove the observer for.

    • notifyObserver

      public void notifyObserver(String id, String message)
      Notifies a specific observer with a new notification message.
      Parameters:
      id - The ID of the user to notify.
      message - The message content to send to the observer.
